analysis: The given dataset contains various metrics related to music tracks, including popularity, duration, and audio features. Visualizing these metrics can help identify correlations and patterns.

visualizations.title: Correlation Matrix of Music Track Metrics
visualizations.justification: This visualization helps to identify the correlation between different metrics, such as the relationship between popularity and danceability.
best_practices: use a suitable size for the heatmap

visualizations.title: Popularity vs Danceability
visualizations.justification: This visualization helps to understand the relationship between the danceability of a track and its popularity, and how different genres compare.
best_practices: use a legend to distinguish between genres

visualizations.title: Distribution of Energy by Genre
visualizations.justification: This visualization helps to compare the distribution of energy across different music genres, and identify genres with high or low energy.
best_practices: use a suitable box plot style
sort the genres by median energy
